@description.name: @description
@description.body: Common base class for all DOM events.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return in a bit map, which modifier keys are pressed. The constants
{@link #SHIFT_MASK}, {@link #CTRL_MASK}, {@link #ALT_MASK} and
{@link #META_MASK} define the bit positions of the corresponding keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} A bit map with the pressed modifier keys.
@return.desc: A bit map with the pressed modifier keys.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the ctrl key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the ctrl key is pressed.
@return.desc: whether the ctrl key is pressed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the shift key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the shift key is pressed.
@return.desc: whether the shift key is pressed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the alt key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the alt key is pressed.
@return.desc: whether the alt key is pressed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the meta key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the meta key is pressed.
@return.desc: whether the meta key is pressed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the ctrl key or (on the Mac) the command key is pressed.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the command key is pressed on the Mac or the ctrl key is pressed on another system.
@return.desc: true if the command key is pressed on the Mac or the ctrl key is pressed on another system.
